question.title: Retrieve all pages iteratively using completablefuture
question.body:
DAO has methods that return completableFuture. To avoid fetching huge result at once, I want to fetch it in pages from DB. The recursive solution stops when result size < pageSize However, to avoid possible stackoverlow error, I want to convert it to iterative solution. Problem is how to chain completable futures iteratively and how to stop chaining when fetched page has less than pageSize rows?

  public CompletionStage<List<Entity>> getAll(List<String> codes) {
    return getAllBatch(codes, 1L, PAGE_SIZE);
  }

  private CompletionStage<List<Entity>> getAllBatch(List<String> codes, Long pageNumber, Long pageSize) {
    return get(codes, pageSize, pageNumber)
        .thenCompose(results -> {
          if (results.size() < pageSize) {
            return completedFuture(results);
          }
          else {
            return getAllBatch(codes, pageNumber + 1, pageSize)
                .thenApply(
                    nextPageResults -> Stream.concat(results.stream(), nextPageResults.stream())
                        .toList());
          }
        });
  }
